post.body: I think so
amazing hack!
yes, join @tberman and I at Monk's Kettle!
Posted about David and Goliath: http://loic.livejournal.com/119196.html
Ordered 3TB of space. Recent disk failures have reminded me of the importance of backups...
time to eliminate more clothes...
reinstalling sharon's computer, hopefully this will give it a few months more happy life...
scotch + dark chocolate = amazing
Slightly obsessed with attached vs free earlobes.
People who are high are stupid.
Party #1
pre-drinking a tecate, writing a pointless twitter bot.
I can tell that there are jokes in this movie by the sentence structures but I'm not laughing. At all.
I'm not very good at watching movies.
Watching a minivan with Kansas plates fail to parallel park in a huuuuuge space.
Watching The Aviator. Sharon seems to share many habits with Howard Hughes.
I always felt bad for the baroness in The Sound of Music.
made a tasty chicken + squash + carrot + lentil soup tonight. good cold weather food. now the castro for the sound of music singalong!
Tequila shots at the bowling alley...
Dolores Park in winter is weird - completely empty, still smells like pot smoke.
